title: Cloud Native E-Commerce Platform
description: Designed and deployed a highly scalable microservices-based e-commerce platform using Kubernetes on AWS. Implemented auto-scaling policies and zero-downtime deployments.

title: Automated CI/CD Pipeline for FinTech App
description: Built a robust CI/CD pipeline for a FinTech application, reducing deployment time by 60%. Integrated security scanning and automated testing stages.

title: Serverless Data Processing Pipeline
description: Architected a serverless data pipeline to process 1TB+ logs daily. Used AWS Lambda and Kinesis for real-time analytics and dashboarding.
